name: @ondewo/t2s-client-typescript
description: Ondewo text to speech client library for typescript as a commonjs module

scripts.build: git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && docker run -it -v ${PWD}:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/..:/output-volume ondewo-typescript-proto-compiler ondewo-t2s-api ondewo

author: Philipp Schweiger @ Ondewo
